oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Holly Ridge Cemetery: Brian Dempsey, Wanda Clark and Allan Hammons
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three attendees at the dedication of the Charley Patton historical marker at Holly Ridge Cemetery.

Holly Ridge Cemetery, located in the heart of the Mississippi Delta, received the first of many historical markers erected to mark the Mississippi Blues Trail. The cemetery includes the grave of Charley Patton, who is considered one of the earliest performers in Delta blues tradition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cemeteries; Historical markers
Blues music; Cemeteries
